item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description: Your privacy is important to us. It is our policy to respect your privacy regarding any information we may collect from you across this website. We never ask for personal information nor do we collect it by any other means. We do not set any cookies to track your visits. We donâ€™t share any personally identifying information publicly or with third-parties, even when required to by law, because we dont have any information on you to give.

item.title: All aboard the privacy train!
item.description: For the last couple of years I have been on a mission to remove the big 5 tech companies from my life, Google, Apple, Facebook, Amazon and Microsoft, or GAFAM for short. I have to admit now that his has been a total failure thus far, however for 2021 I decided to make some progress on this endevour. I will state the obvious now, if you want privacy, dont have your last name as your domain but the damage there is done.
